petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: CR put up today as I.o of the case submitted Charge sheet vide No. 136/19 dated 30-06-2019 against the accused Ashraful Sk, S/o Rahmat Ali u/s 376IPC R/W 4 of POCSO Act along with one copy of seizure list and one copy of medical report along with original case diary through PSI Bilasipara. PSI bilasipara submitted the same vide challan. Register the case as Special POCSO Act.Cognizance is taken against the accused Ashraful sk alias Islam under charge sheeted section 376 IPC R/W 4 of POCSO Act. Issue summon to accused person. Also issue notice to bailor. Fixing 23-12-2019 for appearance of accused with bailor.
Accused is absent with ptn vide no. 2241/19 showing cause of absence of the accused. Fix 03-01-2020 for appearance of accused.

Accused Ashraful Islam has appeared with a ptn. vide 19/2020 praying for previous bail. Seen the ptn. Bailor Abdul Aziz has filed a ptn vide 18/2020 stating that he would continue as bailor of the accused. Seen the accued. Perused the case record. Considering all previous bail is accepted. Fixing 18-01-2020 for copy
CR put up today as P.O is on CL

Accused Ashraful Seikh is present. Perused the case record.Heard both sides.It appears that there are sufficient materials u/s 376 IPC and u/s 4 of POCSO Act. Charge is, accordingly, framed u/s 376 IPC and u/s 4 of POCSO Act against the accused.The charges are read over and explained to the accused to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried.Issue summons to all witnesses.
Accused Ashraful Sheikh is present. No witnesses are present. Issue fresh summon to the witnesses. Fixing 11-02-2020 for evidence.

Accused is present. Witness namely Morjina Khatun, Sorbesh Ali and Omela Khatun are present. they are examined,cross examined and discharged. Issue summon to all remainin witnesses. Fixing 29-02-2020 for evidence.
Accused is present. Witness Taizuddin Seikh is present, he is examined,cross examined and discharged. Issue summon to remaining witnesses. Fixing 12-03-2020 for evidence.
Accused is present. Witnesses Fariul Hoque and Lalchand Ali are present, they are examined,cross examined and discharged. Issue summon to all remaining witnesses. Fixing 21-03-2020 for evidence.

Case is adjourned today as a preventive measure to fight against the outbreak of Novel Corona Virus (COVID-19). Also no hazira (attendance) / petition are also placed by the concerned accused/petitioner/O.P. or learned counsel in this case as Lockdown has been imposed all over.

Case is adjourned today as a preventive measure to fight against the outbreak of Novel Corona Virus (COVID-19). Also no hazira (attendance) / petition are also placed by the concerned accused/petitioner/O.P. or learned counsel in this case as Lockdown has been imposed all over.
